== Description ==

Get the size of a directory.

A helper function that is used primarily to check whether a blog has exceeded its allowed upload space.

== Usage ==

%%%<?php get_dirsize( $directory ); ?>%%%

{{Parameter|$directory|string||required}}

{{Return||int|}}
